description:
'Thor: Love and Thunder' is an upcoming American superhero film based on the Marvel Comics character Thor. It is produced by Marvel Studios, directed by Taika Waititi, and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. It is intended to be the direct sequel to Thor: Ragnarok (2017) and the 29th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) as part of Phase Four of the MCU. The film is scheduled to premiere in Los Angeles on June 23, 2022, and released in the United States on July 8, 2022.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if when checked on the resolution date 'Thor: Love and Thunder' has a 75% or higher Tomatometer rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Otherwise, this market will resolve to 'No'.

The resolution source (Tomatometer All Critics Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/thor_love_and_thunder) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - July 11 2022 at 12:00 PM ET. This market may not resolve before then.

---------------

Rotten Tomatoes' Tomatometer is the percentage of all Approved Tomatometer Critics who have given this movie a positive review.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 12 hours, until the actual data is available. If the data is not available on the resolution source by July 18 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.

question: Will 'Thor: Love and Thunder' get a 75% or higher Tomatometer Score?
